title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & other GGUF models with a REST/CLI API and Docker images.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to run Ollama models as LLMs, chat or embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for any Ollama model, supports RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with chat history, model switching and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official CUDA-enabled container image for NVIDIA GPUs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama-index for private document QA.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to generate notes or summaries using Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with model selection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained async Rust crate for Ollama API (crates.io: ollama-rs).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama (NuGet: Ollama).

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama (pkg.go.dev).

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Community-curated registry of GGUF models ready to run with Ollama (with Modelfile snippets).
